document.docAuthor: Deng, Wei-An, Zheng, Zhe-Min & Wei, Shi-Zhen
document.masterDocTitle: A taxonomic study of the genus Bolivaritettix Günther (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae: Metrodorinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A taxonomic study of the genus Bolivaritettix Günther (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae: Metrodorinae)

heading.emphasis:
Key to the species of
Bolivaritettix Günther

paragraph.keyLead:
2 . Pronotum longer, hind process reaching top of hind femur, apex concave; hind femur with 2–3 tubercules on outside
........................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix amphinotoides
Günther

3 . Anterior margin of vertex not protruding beyond eyes; width of longitudinal furrow narrower than width of first seg- ment of antennae; antennae inserted below lower margin of eyes ..................................
Bolivaritettix apterus (Rehn)

- Anterior margin of vertex protruding beyond eyes; width of longitudinal furrow wider than width of first segment of antennae; antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes ......................................................................................... 4
8 . Width of vertex as wide as width of one eye; upper margin of pronotum undulated in profile ................................... 9

9 . Wings only reaching middle of hind femora; width of midfemur wider than width of tegmina; width of longitudinal sulcus of frontal ridge narrower than width of first antennal segment; midkeel of pronotum entire; hind margin of female subgenital plate rounded with a triangular process in middle
... Bolivaritettix brevipennis
Deng, Zheng et Wei
- Wings reaching top of hind process of pronotum; width of midfemur narrower than or equal to width of tegmina. 10

10 . Antennae inserted between lower third of eyes; width of longitudinal sulcus of frontal ridge equal to width of first segment of antenna; midkeel of pronotum interrupted; hind margin of female subgenital plate with three teeth .........
........................................................................................................................................ Bolivaritettix tibetanus
Zheng

- Antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; width of longitudinal sulcus of frontal ridge narrower than width of first segment of antenna; midkeel of pronotum entire; hind margin of female subgenital plate with a triangular process in middle ........................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix luchunensis Liang

13 . Width of vertex 2 times the width of one eye; without a pair of abbreviated carinae beween shoulders; upper margin of pronotum straight in profile ...........................................................................
Bolivaritettix ghumtianus (Hancock)
- Width of vertex 1.2–1.5 times the width of one eye; with a pair of abbreviated carinae beween shoulders.............. 14

14 . Lateral keels of prozona parallel; hind wing longer, nearly reaching top of hind femur; upper margin of pronotum flat, only between shoulders undulated
...................................................................... Bolivaritettix brachynotus
Zheng

- Lateral keels of prozona constricted backward; hind wing shorter, only reaching three fourths of pronotum; upper margin of pronotum slightly undulated behind shoulders .................................
Bolivaritettix fanjingshanensis Zheng

16 . Width of vertex equal to width of one eye; antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; lower margins of mid- dle femora straight .....................................................................................
Bolivaritettix unduladorsalis Zheng et Shi

- Width of vertex wider than width of one eye; antennae inserted between lower third of eyes; lower margins of mid- dle femora undulated........................................................................
Bolivaritettix circocephaloisoides Zheng et Deng
17 . Width of vertex equal to or narrower than width of one eye; upper margin of pronotum undulated ......................... 18

- Width of vertex 1.5–1.6 times the width of one eye; upper margin of pronotum slightly convex before shoulders and flat behind shoulders ................................................................................................................................................... 22

18 . Antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; hind process of pronotum not reaching or reaching top of hind femora; hind wings reaching top of hind process of pronotum .............................
Bolivaritettix circocephalu
s Zheng

20 . Width of vertex equal to width of one eye; lateral keels of pronotal prozona parallel; hind wings surpassing top of hind process; lower margin of midfemur undulate ......................
Bolivaritettix liuwanshanensis Deng, Zheng et Wei

- Width of vetex narrower than width of one eye; lateral keels of pronotal prozona constricted backwards; wings not reaching top of hind process; lower margin of midfemur straight..................................................................................
...................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix darongshanensis
Deng, Zheng et Wei

21 . Lateral keels of prozona constricted backward; pronotum black; width of midfemur equal to width of tegmina.........
............................................................................................................ Bolivaritettix celaenotus
Zheng, Zhang et Dang

- Lateral keels of prozona parallel; pronotum brown; width of midfemur wider than width of tegmina .........................
.............................................................................................................. Bolivaritettix guilinensis
Deng, Zheng et Wei

22 . Pronotum with humeral angle widely rounded; hind wing only reaching middle of hind femur; width of midfemur 3 times the width of tegmina................................................................................
Bolivaritettix microptera Zheng et Ou

- Pronotum with humeral angle obtuse angular; hind wing reaching top of hind process; width of midfemur as wide as width of tegmina .............................................................................................
Bolivaritettix pianmaensis Zheng et Ou

25 . Anterior margin of vertex protruded beyond eyes; antennae inserted one third of anterior margin of eyes; upper mar- gin of pronotum undulated in profile; lower margins of middle femora straight ...........................................................
................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix ochronotata
Deng, Zheng & Wei, 2007

- Anterior margin of vertex not protruded beyond eyes; antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; upper mar- gin of pronotum straight in profile; lower margins of middle femora undulated ...........................................................
...................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix fugongensis
Zheng et Mao
- Lateral keels of pronotal prozona distinctly constricted backwards........................................................................... 28

27 . Disc of pronotum coarse, with numerous tubercles; upper margin of pronotum undulated in profile; lower margins of middle femora straight ............................................................................. Bolivritettix rongshuiensis Zheng et Jiang

- Disc of pronotum smooth; upper margin of pronotum straight or slightly convex before shoulders in profile; lower margins of middle femora undulated
......................................................... Bolivaritettix longzhouensis
Zheng et Jiang

28 . Width of vertex narrower than width of one eye about 1.75 times; upper margin of pronotum sraight in profile; antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; width of midfemuir narrower than width of tegmina.....................
........................................................................................................................................ Bolivaritettix liboensis
Zheng

29 . Antennae inserted between lower third of eyes; width of midfemuir wider than width of tegmina; wings reaching top of hind process of pronotum ...............................................................
Bolivaritettix nigrifemurus Deng, Zheng et Wei

- Antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; width of midfemuir narrower than width of tegmina; wings sur- passing top of hind process of pronotum .................................................................
Bolivaritettix tenuifemura
sp.nov.
- Upper margin of pronotum nearly straight or slightly convex before shoulders........................................................ 34
32 . Hind wing surpassing top of hind process; vertex distinctly narrowed in front, eyes distinctly exserted......................

33 . Vertex and frontal ridge forming a right angle in profile; disc of pronotum smooth; midkeel complete; upper margin of pronotum undulated before and behind shoulders; hind process of pronotum reaching middle of hind tibia ...........
.................................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix sculptus
(Bolivar)

- Vertex and frontal ridge forming an obtuse angle in profile; disc of pronotum with numerous tubercles; midkeel interrupted; upper margin of pronotum undulated; hind process of pronotum reaching basal of hind tibia ..................
................................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix torulosinota
Zheng

34 . Width of midfemur narrower than width of visible part of tegmina; upper margin of pronotum elevated before shoulders..........................................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix fuscoviridis Ingrisch

35 . Upper margin of pronotum straight; lateral keels of prozona slightly constricted backwards; width of vertex slightly narrower than width of one eye.................................................................................
Bolivaritettix javanicus (Bolivar)
- Upper margin of pronotum slightly convex before shoulders; lateral keels of prozona parallel................................ 36

36 . Width of vertex as wide as width of one eye; antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; anterior margin of vertex not concave before lateral ocelli in profile...................................
Bolivaritettix huanjiangensis Zheng et Jiang

- Width of vertex wider than width of one eye; antennae inserted below lower margins of eyes; anterior margin of vertex concave before lateral ocelli in profile...................................................................
Bolivaritettix remissa (Bolívar)
38 . Midkeel of pronotum interrupted; disc of pronotum coarse, with numerous tubercles.............................................. 39

39 . Width of vertex wider than width of one eye; antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; lateral keels of prozona constricted backwards ........................................................................................................................................ 40

40 . Vertex and frontal ridge rounded together in profile; with a pair of abbreviated carinae between shoulders; hind wing surpassing top of hind process; lower margins of fore and middle femora without teeth; width of midfemur equal to width of tegmina ...............................................................................................
Bolivaritettix jiuwanshanensis Zheng

- Vertex and frontal ridge forming right angle in profile; without a pair of abbreviated carinae beween shoulders; hind wing slightly not reaching top of hind process; lower margins of fore and middle femora with two teeth; width of midfemur slightly wider than width of tegmina ..............................
Bolivaritettix serrifemoralis Deng, Zheng et Wei

41 . Upper margin of pronotum straight in profile; lower margins of fore and middle femora straight; width of midfemur slightly narrower than width of tegmina .........................................................
Bolivaritettix interrupta Zheng et Jiang

- Upper margin of pronotum undulated in profile; lower margins of fore and middle femora undulated; width of midfemur equal to width of tegmina ....................................................
Bolivaritettix daweishanensis Deng, Zheng et Wei

43 . Lateral keels of prozona parallel; pronotum somewhat rugose, extending considerably reaching two-thirds of hind tibia ................................................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix insignis (Kirby)

- Lateral keels of prozona constricted backwards; disc of pronotum smooth or with numerous short longitudinal ridges; hind process of pronotum reaching middle or top of hind tibia...................................................................... 44

44 . Disc of pronotum smooth; hind process of pronotum reaching middle of hind tibia; three pulvilli of first segment of hind tarsi small, equal in length; size larger..............................................................
Bolivaritettix lativertex
(Br, - W.)

- Disc of pronotum with numerous short longitudinal ridges; hind process of pronotum reaching top of hind tibia; three pulvilli of first segment of hind tarsi large, third pulvillus nearly round; size small.............................................
...................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix latipulvilus
Zheng et Jiang
46 . Vertex and frontal ridge forming an obtuse or right angle in profile.......................................................................... 47

48 . Dorsum of pronotum behind shoulders with deep seated fossulae; posterior angles of lateral lobes of pronotum truncated and notched in middle
......................................................................................... Bolivaritettix tandoni
Shishodia

- Dorsum of pronotum behind shoulders with less deep seated fossulae; posterior angles of lateral lobes of pronotum truncated and not notched in middle .........................................................................
Bolivaritettix roonwali Shishodia

keyLead.keyStep: 49 . Vertex and frontal ridge forming an obtuse angle in profile; frontal ridge not concave between lateral ocelli; caudal end of pronotum reaching middle of hind tibia; lower margins of middle femora undulated ........................................

subSubSection.paragraph:
............................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix luteolineatus
Zheng, Li and Shi - Vertex and frontal ridge forming an right angle in profile; frontal ridge concave between lateral ocelli; caudal end of pronotum slightly reaching top of hind tibia; lower margins of middle femora straight................................................
................................................................................................................ Bolivaritettix hechiensis
Deng, Zheng et Wei
50 . Disc of pronotum with numerous tubercles; without a pair of abbreviated carinae between shoulders; width of midfemur wider than width of tegmina...........................................................................
Bolivaritettix tuberdorfalis Liang

paragraph.keyLead:
- Disc of pronotum smooth; with a pair of abbreviated carinae between shoulders; width of midfemur narrower than width of tegmina .......................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix menglaensis Zheng

51 . Antennae inserted between lower third of eyes; hind wings not surpassing top of hind process of pronotum; midfemur equal to width of tegmina ..............................................................
Bolivaritettix nigripennis Deng, Zheng et Wei

- Antennae inserted between lower margins of eyes; hind wings not surpassing top of hind process of pronotum; width of midfemur narrower than width of tegmina............................................................................................................. 52

52 . Width of sulcus of frontal ridge as wide as width of basal segment of antennae; pronotum with humeral angle obtuse angular; with a pair of abbreviated carinae between shoulders; hind tibia brown
...... Bolivaritettix medogensis
Zheng

- Width of sulcus of frontal ridge narrower than width of basal segment of antennae; pronotum with humeral angle rounded; without abbreviated carinae between shoulders; hind tibia black .....
Bolivaritettix hutiaoxiana Zheng et Ou
54 . Hind process of pronotum shorter, slightly surpassing top of hind femur.................................................................. 55
- Hind process of pronotum longer, its apex nearly surpassing middle of hind tibia.................................................... 59

55 . Width of vertex 1.3 times width of one eye; vertex and frontal ridge rounded together in profile; hind margin of female subgenital plate rounded with a triangular process in middle
..... Bolivaritettix wuliangshanensis
Zheng et Ou

- Frontal ridge not concave before lateral ocelli; middle femora slightly undulated; length of first segment of hind tarsi longer than third.......................................................................................................................................................... 58

57 . Antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; pronotum with a pair of depressions behind shoulders .................
.................................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix guentheri
Ingrisch

- Antennae inserted below lower margin of eyes; pronotum without a pair of depressions behind shoulders.................
................................................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix asperula
(Bolívar)

58 . Pronotum with humeral angle obtuse angular; hind wing nearly reaching top of hind process; width of midfemur slightly wider than width of tegmina; female subgenital plate longer than wide ...........................................................
........................................................................................................... Bolivaritettix chongqingensis
Zheng, Li and Shi

- Pronotum with humeral umeral angle rounded, distinctly constricted behind; hind wing reaching top of hind process; width of midfemur as wide as width of tegmina; length of female subgenital plate as long as wide.............................
............................................................................................................................. Bolivaritettix tridentata
Zheng et Ou

59 . Upper margin of pronotum with three humps before shoulders (
Fig. 10
), last hump erect; humeral angle widely rounded .......................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix tubericarina Zheng et Jiang
- Upper margin of pronotum slightly convex before shoulders in profile .................................................................... 60

62 . Width of vertex equal to width of one eye.........................................
Bolivaritettix luochengensis Deng,Zheng et Wei

63 . Vertex 1.5 times wider than one eye; lateral keels of pronotal prozona short, slightly constricted backwards; humeral angle obtuse angular.................................................................................................................................................... 64

- Vertex 1.7–2.2 times wider than one eye; lateral keels of pronotal prozona long, distinctly constricted backwards; humeral angle widely rounded.................................................................................................................................... 66

64 . Midkeel of pronotum interrupted; pronotum with the front marginal carinae distinctly converging behind, the disc nearly smooth, with longitudinal wrinkles, but without tubercles
Bolivaritettix convergens
(Brunner von Wattenwyl)

65 . Antennae inserted below lower margin of eyes; lower margin of midfemur undulated; length of third segment of posterior tarsi equal to the firs....................................................................................
Bolivaritettix humeralis Günther

- Antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; lower margin of midfemur straight; length of third segment of posterior tarsi longer than the first ...............................................................................
Bolivaritettix longitarsus Liang

66 . Width of vertex 1.7 times the width of one eye; lateral margin of pronotum distinctly constricted behind humeral angle; width of midfemur slightly wider than width of tegmina; length of pronotum 2.9 (Ƥ) times length of the part surpassing top of hind femur; female subgenital plate at hind margin with three teeth of equal length .......................
.............................................................................................................................. Bolivaritettix circinihumerus
Zheng

- Width of vertex 2–2.2 times the width of one eye; lateral margin of pronotum not constricted behind humeral angle; width of midfemur narrower than width of tegmina................................................................................................... 67

67 . Body very pale, almost white; antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; surface of pronotum with rather large granules in centre of disc .........................................................................................
Bolivaritettix albus Ingrisch

68 . In profile, upper margin of pronotum slightly convex before shoulders; disc of pronotum with numerous tubercles; disc of pronotum with a wide longitudinal yellow stripes in the middle
.... Bolivaritettix galbustrial
Zheng, Wei et Li

- In profile, upper margin of pronotum distinctly convex before shoulders; disc of pronotum smooth; disc of pronotum dark brown .............................................................................................
Bolivaritettix yunnanensis Zheng et Mao

71 . Antennae inserted below lower margin of eyes; lateral ocelli placed in between lower third of eyes; width of midfemur narrower than width of tegmina.................................................................
Bolivaritettix sanbaishanensis
sp.nov.
- Antennae inserted between lower margin of eyes; lateral ocelli placed in middle between eyes .............................. 72

72 . Anterior margin of vertex convex before eye in profile; pronotum longer, length of pronotum 3–5 times the length of the part surpassing top of hind femur; body smaller; length of body bout 15–16 mm ( 3 ) and 17–18 mm (Ƥ) ............
........................................................................................................................ Bolivaritettix gubeiensis
Zheng et Jiang

- Anterior margin of vertex not convex before eye in profile; pronotum shorter, length of pronotum 7–8 times the length of the part surpassing top of hind femur; body smaller; length of body bout 11–12 mm ( 3 ) and 12–13 mm (Ƥ)......................................................................................................
Bolivaritettix yuanbaoshanensis Zheng et Jiang
